__comment_type: The type of skybox that this is.  String containing either 'color' or 'textured'.  Required.
__comment_texture: The texture used for the custom skybox.  Requires full identifier path to each texture.  Textures should be square in resolution.  Required.
__comment_axis: The rotation of the skybox.  Set to [0, 0] to disable.  Takes a array of two integers between -180 and 180.  Required.
__comment_shouldRotate: Whether the skybox should rotate on its axis.  Boolean.  Optional.  Default false
__comment_fadeTimes: The times, in ticks, when a skybox will fade in/out.  Integers.  Required.
__comment_maxAlpha: The maximum that the alpha can be.  Float between 0-1.  Optional.  Default 1.
__comment_transitionSpeed: The speed that skyboxes will fade in/out when passing into/out of valid conditions.  Float between 0-1.  Optional.  Default 1
__comment_weather: The weather that the skybox can show up in.  Can be a array of strings or a single string representing the weather (clear, rain, thunder, snow).  Optional.  By default weather check is disabled.
__comment_dimensions: The dimensions that the skybox can show up in.  Can be a array of strings or a single string representing a identifier.  Optional.  By default dimensions check is disabled.
__comment_biomes: The biomes that the skybox can show up in.  Can be a array of strings or a single string representing a identifier.  Optional.  By default biomes check is disabled.
__comment_heightRanges: The height ranges that the skybox can show up in.  Array containing arrays of float ranges.  Optional.  By default height range check is disabled.
